name: zurg-serverless
description: A serverless Real Debrid WebDAV server with HTML file browser and .STRM file-based streaming, running as a Cloudflare Worker, using Cloudflare D1.

scripts.dev-safe: pkill -f workerd 2>/dev/null || true && sleep 1 && wrangler dev --config wrangler.local.toml
scripts.dev-clean: pkill -f workerd && sleep 2 && wrangler dev --config wrangler.local.toml
scripts.kill-workerd: pkill -f workerd && echo 'Killed workerd processes' || echo 'No workerd processes found'
scripts.dev-check: ps aux | grep workerd | grep -v grep || echo 'âœ… No workerd processes running'

author: Zurg Serverless Community
